metadata.title: CVE-2024-26622 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: tomoyo:fix UAF write bug in tomoyo_write_control() Since tomoyo_write_control()updates head->write_buf when write() of long lines is requested, we need tofetch head->write_buf after head->io_sem is held. Otherwise, concurrentwrite() requests can cause use-after-free-write and double-free problems.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
